summary: REFERENCE PE13-016 CHRYSLER 300 (HEMI)    WHEN FILLING MY CAR WITH GAS (SHIELDS) THE CAR WILL STUTTERED, ACT AS IF IS TRYING TO SHIFT GEAR AND ENGINE LIGHT WILL COME ON.  THIS PARTICULAR DAY GOING HOME DOWN A HILL, THE CAR STARTED STOPPING MOTIONS AND STOP, AFTER STARTING FOR THE SECOND TIME IT BEGIN TO JUMP AN AS IF IT WAS TRYING TO SHIFT GEARS, AFTER BEGAN SHAKING AN VIBRATING REALLY HARD AND STOPPED WAS TOLL BY MY INSURANCE COMPANY USAA, TO MY HOUSE IN THE MIDDLE OF THE NIGHT, THE NEXT MORNING TO THE AUTOMOTIVE SHOP ...900.00 TO GET IT STARTED .  IT CONTINUES TO JERK AS IF IT IS TRYING TO SHIFT GEARS AND THE ENGINE LIGHT IS ON.  PLEASE HELP  *TR
